author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.62: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!

Version 2.0: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to change date formats (UK & US style)
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
Minor release to improve the battery percentage refresh.

Watchface with a simple, elegant look which displays the day of the month in the middle, and battery level below, as well as the time in analogue format.  The clock border displays when the watch is Bluetooth connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status.  The colours of EVERY element in the clock can be customised in the configuration menu!!  The second hand can be hidden, and the clock only updated every minute if desired to save battery.  Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.  Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

description:
Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!! 
--------------------------------------------------------------------Version 2.0: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel 

----------------------------------------------------------------- 

Watchface with a simple, elegant look which displays the day of the month in the middle, and battery level below, as well as the time in analogue format.

The clock border displays when the watch is Bluetooth connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status.

The colours of EVERY element in the clock can be customised in the configuration menu!!  The second hand can be hidden, and the clock only updated every minute if desired to save battery.  Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.

Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.62: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!
